author: Fiona Denton
description:
The decision to pick up a debut novel is always something of a leap of faith as a reader. Kill the Beast, Serra Swift’s debut, was first described to me as a gritty, yet cosy, fantasy hybrid of The Witcher and Howl’s Moving Castle, and perfect for fans of T. Kingfisher and Naomi Novik. Well, […]

The post REVIEW: Kill the Beast by Serra Swift appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Kill the Beast by Serra Swift
